name: Irin and the Abyss
description:
A stylized, nature-themed walking sim in which you play as Irin, a rodent/rabbit hybrid.

Made as part of a workshop held by the Game Development Club at SJSU.

Credits

Kevin Prakash - Lead programmer/Designer: https://github.com/kevprakash

Erin Kelley - Art Director/3D Modeler: http://www.erinekelley.com/

Nathan - Co-programmer/UI Artist

Bre Smith - Animation: https://www.bresmithanimator.com/

Nadia de Waal - Modeling/Art assets: https://www.artstation.com/interfectorfactory
